name: Suddenly Darling
overview:
About Suddenly Darling

Suddenly Darling (www.suddenlydarling.com) is an online fashion guide and community for teen girls and young women, providing advice, community forums, an online store and other features that promote a combination of affordable fashion and positive self-worth. The site includes specialized areas dedicated to â€˜what to wear,â€™ along with the Darling Store, Darling Advice, Darling Celebs, Darling Contests, regularly updated videos and many other features. Membership to Suddenly Darling is free-of-charge, enabling young women to actively participate in the siteâ€™s community driven areas, whether uploading photos of their outfit styles, exchanging advice and asking questions, or engaging in a Darlings Give Back section.
